value:
This realm is embroiled in war. I fear
that no matter where I travel, war
is everywhere.

I'm told that I'm not the hardiest of
Heroes, but I promise to always
give any task my best.

Thank you for your guidance in all
matters. It gives each and every one
of us the confidence to fight.

If the weather is pleasant today, it
might be nice if you and I head off
on a stroll.

My son Roy is my pride and joy.
I'm not afraid to admit that he
surpasses me in all ways.$k$pRoy's a stronger fighter, and if that
wasn't enough, he's a much better
student of life than I could ever be.

Hello there. I was asked to come
visit by your good friend
$Nf.$k$pMay your friendship last
forever.

Great! Now I can contribute even
better!
Good. I'll have to keep this up.
Sorry. I mustn't be feeling well.

I won't let this go to my head.
I'll work even harder now.

My name is Eliwood. I'm a noble
from a small realm known as
Pherae. I hope I'll be of use to you.

Looking back on our first meeting,
it now seems that we were destined
to cross paths from the start.$k$pYou believe in every one of us,
of course, and you give your
all...to us all.$k$pBut I take special courage from
knowing you. It's as if you're
a beacon of hope.$k$pI feel as if I could overcome any
obstacle, and I have too rarely
felt such strength.$k$pThis is why I hope to
keep fighting alongside you, for
as long as you'll have me.
はっ！
せいっ！
うああっ！
Drat...
Off with you, fiend!
This should do it!
Now, take this!
Watch me work!
Forgive me...
Haha
Hmm? Did you need me?
Ha! Want to bend my ear? You need only ask!
Both you and this place couldn't be more welcoming. Thank you.
I'm not the hardiest fighter you'll ever meet, but I'll prove my use.
I can tell you're the type to push yourself too hard. So please, take care.
You seem to gather very good friends around you. Admirable!
May we all return from battle alive and unscathed.
Very well.
What next?
Let's go.
